parameters.name: AssemblyDisplayStateOption
parameters.description: Display state option as defined in swDisplayStateOpts_e

parameters.name: AssemblyDisplayStateNames
parameters.description: Array of assembly display state names; valid only if AssemblyDisplayStateOption is set to swDisplayStateOpts_e.swSpecifyDisplayState

title: IComponent2.GetReferencedDisplayStates
description: Gets the display states of this component that are referenced by the specified assembly display state(s).
signature:
System.Object GetReferencedDisplayStates( 
   System.Int32
AssemblyDisplayStateOption
,
   System.Object
AssemblyDisplayStateNames
)

parameters.name: AssemblyDisplayStateOption
parameters.description: Display state option as defined in swDisplayStateOpts_e

parameters.name: AssemblyDisplayStateNames
parameters.description: Array of assembly display state names; valid only if AssemblyDisplayStateOption is set to swDisplayStateOpts_e.swSpecifyDisplayState

returns: Array of referenced display state names
